results.overview: L’odyssée sanglante et burlesque de petits malfrats dans la jungle d’Hollywood : Deux petits tueurs, un dangereux gangster marié à une camée, un boxeur roublard, des prêteurs sur gages sadiques, un caïd élégant et dévoué, un dealer bon mari et deux tourtereaux à la gâchette facile.
results.title: Pulp Fiction

results.overview: The cast and crew talk about Pulp Fiction.  Directed by Quentin Tarantino.
results.title: Making of Pulp Fiction

results.overview: A guilty pleasure of the mid-20th century, pulp fiction magazines were often defined less by their contents than by their provocative covers. This documentary explores the shocking art that brought life to these lurid publications. Filmmaker Jamie McDonald delves into the collection of art historian Robert Lesser, shedding light on this nearly forgotten art form and the ways it impacted popular culture.
results.title: Pulp Fiction Art

results.overview: Behind the scenes of the legendary classic film by Quentin Tarantino.
results.title: Pulp Fiction: the Facts

results.overview: A diehard Quentin Tarantino fan recruits his friend Elizabeth to steal a 35mm film reel of Pulp Fiction.
results.title: Stealing Pulp Fiction

results.original_title: Pulp Fiction: The Golden Age of Storytelling
results.overview: This program profiles writers of the 20s, 30s, and 40s--known as the Pulp Fiction era. These writers created the iconic movies and characters who live on today in our collective hearts and imaginations. It has even been estimated that 90-95% of the top blockbusters in Hollywood movies were based on stories from the Pulp Fiction era.
results.title: Pulp Fiction: The Golden Age of Storytelling
